div.pre: 📄 ReuseMe - REUSE compliance validation ---------------------------------------- ✅ ./lib/action/index.js ✅ ./lib/cli/index.js ✅ ./lib/probot/index.js ✅ ./package-lock.json ✅ ./package.json ❌ ./src/validator.ts ./src/validator.ts:0:0: error: Each Covered File MUST have Licensing Information associated with it. ./src/validator.ts:0:0: error: Each Covered File MUST have Copyright Information associated with it. ✅ ./tsconfig.json ---------------------------------------- ❌ Found 2 REUSE compliance issues.
